text: I can still hear my daughter screaming I
said we will stop these deaths
some people called me mad but I feel
relieved when a life is saved my name is
taurus Francis
I have a small family two of my
daughters passed away one of them died
in a road accident you ask yourself why
can't people be more careful after she
died my husband started to visit the
site of the accident he became unwell I
also used to go there and cry every time
there was another accident I thought I
have to do something then one day I gave
my husband is stick and told him that we
will stop these deaths when I started
directing the traffic no one was willing
to stop everyone was in a hurry they
said why are you stopping us who gave
you the permission to stop the National
Highway but when people knew my story
they began to understand when they
stopped at the traffic lights there were
fewer accidents
it was november ninth i can't forget
that day we were together in a tuk-tuk
when a car hit us I can still hear my
daughter screaming but i have many
memories of my daughter's childhood she
was very naughty her daughter Alicia is
so much like her it feels like she is
here with us i wake up at five in the
morning I have to make everyone happy
then I think there are thousands of
people there I have to go
and when I come back home I feel good
there is a sense of relief that my
daughter's soul rests in peace as long
as I'm alive I won't stop
you
